title: Magic Water & Laser Light Show Including Pick Up And Drop Off
description:
We will take you to the The Magic Water Circuit, which is one of the main atractions that Lima City has to offer by night. 

This park has the Guinness Book record for the largest fountain complex in the world, displaying 13 different fountains and many are interactive. All of the fountains are illuminated at nigh with colorful laser light synchronized with classical and Peruvian music.

In addition, you should know that our company mission is to support our nonprofit sister organization Reciprocity NGO. With the profits from our tours, Reciprocity NGO is able to implement social projects that improve the quality of life for the communities living below the poverty line.
all_descriptions:
We will take you to the The Magic Water Circuit, which is one of the main atractions that Lima City has to offer by night. 

This park has the Guinness Book record for the largest fountain complex in the world, displaying 13 different fountains and many are interactive. All of the fountains are illuminated at nigh with colorful laser light synchronized with classical and Peruvian music.

In addition, you should know that our company mission is to support our nonprofit sister organization Reciprocity NGO. With the profits from our tours, Reciprocity NGO is able to implement social projects that improve the quality of life for the communities living below the poverty line.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Circuito Magico Del Agua, Jr. Madre de Dios S/N Parque de la Reserva, Lima 15046 PeruWe will go to the "Magic Water Park". It is one of the main attractions that the city of Lima has to offer at night. It is considered a highlight by the locals. It is in the Guinness Book of Records for the largest fountain complex in the world, displaying 13 different fountains and many are interactive. All of the fountains are illuminated at night with colorful laser light show and synchronized to classical music.Duration: 1 hour 30 minutes
Av. José Larco 724, Miraflores 15074, PeruDear client, if you don't want pick up, you can meet us at our office located at Av. Jose Larco 724, Miraflores.
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.

History of Peru in light show

The park was beautiful. Gaby was our guide and was able to explain the meaning of each fountain and the symbolism. She also took time to explain in advance how the story of Peru's history would be told during the light show. She was open to answering questions about life in Peru. Enjoyed the evening.
Written July 6, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Roam60415588556
Thank you for your kind review! We're glad you enjoyed the park and the evening experience. Gaby will be happy to know her explanations and insights helped bring meaning and context to the fountains and the light show. It's great to hear you felt comfortable asking questions and learning more about life in Peru.

reviews.title: Light show Lima
reviews.text: Aaron was a great guide. Very friendly, informative, made sure we were in the best place to see the show. Great with his language.

reviews.title: Magical Experience
reviews.text: We really enjoyed those tour! No wait at the gate and Saul was very informative and helpful in giving us history and background on all the attractions we saw. We highly recommend!

reviews.title: History of Peru in light show
reviews.text: The park was beautiful. Gaby was our guide and was able to explain the meaning of each fountain and the symbolism. She also took time to explain in advance how the story of Peru's history would be told during the light show.  She was open to answering questions about life in Peru.  Enjoyed the evening.

reviews.title: Wonderful La Reserva Park!
reviews.text: Thanks to Amadeus we had a wonderful experience, great guide, very kind, enthusiastic and helpful! It is clear that he loves his job and his country! 100 points, highly recommended

reviews.title: Amazing Tour!
reviews.text: We loved the tour!Sylvana was a great guide. She gave us so much information and she shared a lot about the peruvian culture with us!Our driver Fernando was also great.Thank you so much!

reviews.title: Magical indeed
reviews.text: Saul was such an excellent guide. He took us to the best place to view the fountains and gave great background stories. He also showed a special places to get great photos.Having the pick up drop off service was well worth the price.

reviews.title: Highly recommended  - both the Magic Water Show and the wonderful guide
reviews.text: Highly recommended for a fun evening with an educational element. My friends and I visited the magic water show with Silvana as our guide and Julio as our very capable driver. Silvana  is an excellent guide, very informative and she ensured we got to see all areas of the park with the beautiful light displays.  Do not be fooled thinking this is just for children and  younger people, my friends and I are in our early 60's and were visiting Lima and Peru for the very first time. This was a great educational experience as we learnt a lot about the history of Peru from the historical depictions in the water fountain show.  We highly recommend this show to anyone and without a doubt, we highly recommend Haku Tours and Silvana if you want a very nice, friendly and well-informed guide.

reviews.title: 5+ Stars – Unforgettable Experience with Haku Tours!
reviews.text: I booked the Magic Water Tour with Haku Tours at the very last minute, and I was blown away by how quickly and smoothly everything was arranged. The communication was outstanding. They responded right away and added me to the tour without any issues. The customer service was truly exceptional!Despite heavy traffic and some delays, our driver Julio went above and beyond to make sure we still had a great experience. The tour itself was beautiful and educational, I learned so much and had such a fun time.I highly recommend this tour (or any tour with Haku) to anyone visiting Lima. It’s absolutely worth the money for the service, knowledge, and care you receive.Huge thanks to the amazing Haku team: Stefano, Pamela, Edwin, Julio, Saoul, and Maverick. Each of you contributed to making my experience unforgettable. Thank you from the bottom of my heart!

reviews.title: Super
reviews.text: Led by Gaby visited the fountains in Lima. Super nice and definitely recommended. Gaby knew a lot about the background of the fountains

reviews.title: Cut out the red tape and enjoy!
reviews.text: The 715, 815, etc film is the highlight. The water maze was fun too. Carlos is a great guide and Cirilo an excellent driver! Would have been far far harder to navigate and less fun without them.
